def main():
    n = int(input())
    day = 1
    num_printers = 1
    num_statues = 0
    while num_statues < n:
        num_statues += num_printers
        num_printers += 1
        day += 1
    print(day)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(next(sys.stdin))
    printers = [1]
    days = 0
    while sum(printers) < n:
        days += 1
        new_printers = 0
        while printers:
            if printers[-1] > 1:
                printers[-1] -= 1
                new_printers += 1
            else:
                printers.pop()
        printers.extend([1]*new_printers)
    print(days)

main()

#Program

n = int(input())

printers = 0
days = 0

while True:
    days += 1
    printers += 1
    n -= printers
    if n <= 0:
        print(days)
        break

from sys import stdin, stdout

n = int(stdin.readline().strip())

printers = 1
days = 0
while printers < n:
    days += 1
    printers += printers

stdout.write(str(days + 1))
